meanings.sent1: The blooie of the fireworks startled the dog.
meanings.sent2: The blooie of the balloon popping made everyone jump.
meanings.sent3: The blooie of the car backfiring made the clown honk his nose in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The blooie of the thunder shook the windows.
meanings.sent5: The blooie of the firecracker echoed through the night.

meanings.definition: A sudden, unexpected event or occurrence.
meanings.sent1: The blooie of the surprise party left her speechless.
meanings.sent2: The blooie of the power outage caught us off guard.
meanings.sent3: The blooie of the cake falling on the floor made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The blooie of the news about the snow day spread quickly.
meanings.sent5: The blooie of the unexpected guest at the door surprised us all.
